thread.title: BRIEF-MGM Growth Properties To Acquire Hard Rock Rocksino Northfield Park For About $1.06 Bln

title: BRIEF-MGM Growth Properties To Acquire Hard Rock Rocksino Northfield Park For About $1.06 Bln
text:
April 5, 2018 / 12:49 PM / Updated 13 minutes ago BRIEF-MGM Growth Properties To Acquire Hard Rock Rocksino Northfield Park For About $1.06 Bln Reuters Staff 
April 5 (Reuters) - MGM Growth Properties LLC: 
* MGM GROWTH PROPERTIES LLC ANNOUNCES AGREEMENT TO ACQUIRE THE HARD ROCK ROCKSINO NORTHFIELD PARK * DEAL FOR APPROXIMATELY $1.06 BILLION 
* ‍MGP PLANS TO FUND PURCHASE PRICE WITH A COMBINATION OF CASH ON HAND AND DEBT​ * PARTY OPERATOR 
* MEMBERSHIP INTEREST PURCHASE DEAL WILL BE FOR 100% OF OUTSTANDING LIMITED LIABILITY CO INTERESTS IN NORTHFIELD PARK ASSOCIATES 
* MGP INTENDS TO RETAIN OWNERSHIP OF REAL ESTATE, ANTICIPATING $50 TO $60 MILLION OF ANNUAL RENT Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
